items.title: Please join the Denver Communists this New Year's Eve as we join with other autonomous anarchists & activists across the...
items.content_html:
Please join the Denver Communists this New Year's Eve as we join with other autonomous anarchists & activists across the Colorado Front Range in solidarity with our incarcerated neighbors & political prisoners like anarchist, activist, and poet, Eric King.

What better way is there to show solidarity other than showing up, making some noise & closing out this shit show of a year together? Show up with your best NYE noise makers, demonstration banners and signs. Who knows, we may even try out a new flavor of üê∑. FED or Jeffco anyone?

We are planning on meeting up at Harriman Lake Park @ 7:30 pm and heading to the facility which is @ 9595 W Quincy Ave Littleton, CO 80123

**Neither we, nor the organizers of this action, are affiliated in any way with Eric King nor the Eric King Support team @SupportEricKing. They just want to show some love and and we are happy to signal boost that!**

items.title: "Jahanian, who works at the Meyer Law Office, testified...
items.content_html:
Abolish ICE Denver

"Jahanian, who works at the Meyer Law Office, testified that the ordinance wouldn't affect the Aurora Police Department's ability to assist federal immigration authorities with criminal law enforcement, but would only restrict the department's cooperation when it comes to civil immigration enforcement. Denver has a similar policy on the books.

The ordinance also called for prohibiting ICE officers from entering city-owned or -operated buildings for an immigration investigatio...n without a warrant signed by a judge. And it sought to prevent the City of Aurora from entering into any contracts with ICE that would deputize city employees to work on immigration enforcement.

Finally, the ordinance would have codified an unwritten policy that instructs city employees, particularly police officers, to not ask for immigration information.

Three councilmembers who spoke against the proposal repeatedly characterized it as an attempt to turn Aurora into a "sanctuary city."

See MoreThe proposal would have limited the city's cooperation with ICE.

westword.com

Aurora Council Rejects Undocumented Immigrant Protection Ordinance

The proposal would have limited the city's cooperation with ICE.The proposal would have limited the city's cooperation with ICE.

From Casa de paz Please watch this short video inviting you to our memorial service to honor the lives of immigrants who have perished along the US/Mexico border in 2020.

Find more info about our memorial service and the Zoom link here: https://www.casadepazcolorado.org/‚Ä¶/the-longest-night-of-th‚Ä¶

A big thank you to Rocky Mountain PBS for sharing this story and encouraging folks to attend the service.

Casa de Paz offers shelter and support to immigrants in Colorado. This winter solstice, they are remembering the lives of people who passed away trying to make it to America.

rmpbs.org

Colorado nonprofit honors the memory of immigrants who died trying to cross the border in 2020

items.title: "One of the policies the families were subjected to was the...
items.content_html:
Abolish ICE Denver

"One of the policies the families were subjected to was the asylum transit ban, which required immigrants to first seek protection in another country through which they traveled before asking for refuge in the US. In July, the 9th Circuit Court of Appeals also blocked the rule, but the ruling didn't help any of the thousands of immigrants, like these families, who had already been subjected to the transit ban.

Under the transit ban policy, those who crossed through a third co...untry, such as Mexico or Guatemala, before arriving at the US southern border were denied asylum during their credible fear interviews, an initial step in the asylum process. After being denied the chance to be screened for asylum, these children and their families were subjected to expedited removal, which allows the government to deport undocumented immigrants without a hearing in front of an immigration judge.Federal courts have said they don't have the authority to weigh in on expedited removals. As a result, judges can't stop the deportation of these families, even though they've found that the policies leading to their deportations are illegal."

See More"These are refugees who are being sent back to the same situation they fled from," an immigration attorney told BuzzFeed News.

buzzfeednews.com

Immigrant Families Are Being Deported Without Their Asylum Claims Heard Lawfully, Advocates Say

"These are refugees who are being sent back to the same situation they fled from," an immigration attorney told BuzzFeed News."These are refugees who are being sent back to the same situation they fled from," an immigration attorney told BuzzFeed News.

items.title: Join us Friday, December 18 at 7 p.m. for a premiere virtual screening of ‚ÄúThe Facility.‚Äù ...
items.content_html:
Join us Friday, December 18 at 7 p.m. for a premiere virtual screening of “The Facility.”

“The Facility” is a short documentary film chronicling the lived experiences of immigrants being held at the GEO detention facility in Aurora, Colorado. This film addresses the personal loss and consequences caused by for-profit detention and the federal government's broken immigration policies. Legal and medical experts highlight horrific abuses including death, medical neglect, nutrition issues, and prolonged detention during the coronavirus pandemic. To tell their stories, current and former detainees, families fighting to be reunited, and advocates come together to share their experiences behind the walls of the GEO immigration detention facility in Aurora.

@acluofcolorado @coloradopeoplesalliance @co_immigrant @keshagrijalva @_floodlight_

Following the screening will be a Q&A session with the director, legal experts, and individuals featured in the film with first-hand experience of the systemic abuse occurring inside the facility.

Panelists include:

Jeremy Flood, “The Facility” Director
Raul Medina Perez, COPA, Community Organizer who was formerly detained at GEO
Kesha Davalos Grijalva, Immigrant rights advocate whose husband is detained at GEO
Keinada Andereas, Colorado Student who was formerly detained at GEO
Hans Meyer, The Meyer Law Office, Lead Attorney
Denise Maes, ACLU of Colorado, Public Policy Director

Please RSVP for the screening in advance for this free event: https://aclu.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_nUbTy8-VQpif8nMzqtUzQw

Trailer: https://youtu.be/cGOCejy48Jo

“The Facility” is presented by ACLU of Colorado, Colorado Immigrant Rights Coalition, and Colorado Hispanic Bar Association.

items.title: Since we began fighting with Elijah McClain's family 15 months ago, power has done everything possible to serve power...
items.content_html:
Since we began fighting with Elijah McClain's family 15 months ago, power has done everything possible to serve power and silence us.

However, this state repression only fans the People's flames!

Those in power tried to take away public comment at city council, the DA's still have Elijah classified as a suspect, fascists have burned down his memorial multiple times, the kops took disgusting reenactment photos of Elijah's murder (the only kop fired so far has been fired for taking these depraved photos), a city councilman sicked the far right on us on with the assistance of a local Nazi radio station, the kops helped a bro attempt to run us over on the highway (breaking a woman's leg), the kops tear-gassed us, beat us, and then two DA's put our comrades in jail for 8 days without a bond hearing and are STILL trying to keep them in cages for for up to 40 YEARS. And now Democratic governor @govofco and @philforcolorado -after the Adams and Arapahoe DA's and APD tried to cage the movement-thinks we aren't going to notice the weak ass shit he is pulling with the state investigation during Thanksgiving holiday?!? APD also tried to release body cam footage to the family and media last Thanksgiving thinking people wouldn't notice!

Democrat politicians always call for "investigations" and "studies" to silence and tire activists and Polis is doing more of the same. Polis knew about Elijah before this summer. Polis knew all along. Let's be real: calling for an investigation into police murder is the Dem Party equivalent of "thoughts and prayers."

We will not take down these watered-down concessions from Dems! Elijah's mother wants these cops and paramedics PROSECUTED

We are watching, we won't stop fighting and we will march and dance and holler until Elijah's mother gets what she asked for--and APD is fucking ABOLISHED

@justiceforelijahmcclain @denverpsl

items.title: Via AFSC Colorado...
items.content_html:
Via AFSC Colorado

***sigue en espanol ***

With the recent outbreak, COVID 19 threatens the lives of everyone imprisoned. #DetentionIsDeadly.

Immigration and Customs Enforcement’s decision to return to business as usual and its GEO detention center in Aurora are not keeping our community safe, and experts agree, the only answer is to #FreeThemAll. Just last month, Dr. Carlos Franco Paredes called for compassionate humanitarian release of all imprisoned people. Join us Monday, November 9th at 6:00 pm at 3130 Oakland in Aurora for a Caravan around the detention center and virtually on FB Live. We will hear from family and impacted individuals and from the Colorado Immigrant Freedom Fund about how your donations can free our people! This event is brought to you by the American Friends Service Committee, the Colorado People’s Alliance, the Colorado Freedom Fund AND the Immigrant Freedom Fund of Colorado.

Con el reciente brote, COVID 19 amenaza la vida de todos los encarcelados. #DetentionIsDeadly. La decisión del Servicio de Inmigración y Control de Aduanas de volver a la normalidad y su centro de detención GEO en Aurora no mantiene a nuestra comunidad segura, y los expertos coinciden en que la única respuesta es #FreeThemAll. El mes pasado, el Dr. Carlos Franco Paredes pidió la liberación humanitaria compasiva de todas las personas encarceladas. Únase a nosotros el lunes 9 de noviembre a las 6:00 pm en 3130 Oakland en Aurora para una caravana alrededor del centro de detención y virtualmente en FB Live. ¡Escucharemos a familiares e individuos afectados y al Fondo de Libertad de Inmigrantes de Colorado sobre cómo sus donaciones pueden liberar a nuestra gente! Este evento es presentado por el American Friends Service Committee, la Colorado People's Alliance, el Colorado Freedom Fund Y el Colorado Immigrant Freedom Fund.

items.title: Join community tomorrow for a press conference with Chris' friends and family....
items.content_html:
Join community tomorrow for a press conference with Chris' friends and family.

A BLM protestor was ran over on their scooter this summer wearing a BLM mask in Denver and many in community feel that it's a major DPD coverup.

Chris was wearing a BLM mask, he tried to get his friends out of harms way and the driver redirected and targeted him, plowing into a group of black kids and killing Chris. All the kids are from out of town and coming back for the DPD press conference Tuesday

Tomorrow we expect police to say they found the car but no driver and DPD may even be closing the investigation b/c the car was supposedly reported stolen before the incident.
